items.content_html: ValidatorPK is a lightweight npm library designed to validate Pakistani phone numbers and CNICs with ease. It provides a simple API to check formats, identify mobile networks, and ensure data authenticity. Perfect for developers building applications for the Pakistani audience.
items.title: hamzarehman033/ValidatorPK:  ValidatorPK is a lightweight npm library designed to validate Pakistani phone numbers and CNICs with ease. It provides a simple API to check formats, identify mobile networks, and ensure data authenticity. Perfect for developers building applications for the Pakistani audience.

items.content_html: Unbloat is a powerful tool designed to help developers manage and clean up their Git repositories by identifying and handling files that were once tracked but are no longer present in the latest commits. It's particularly useful for maintaining a lightweight repo without compromising commit history.

It's particularly useful for maintaining a lightweight repo without compromising commit history.
